alert.note: Alert for Lumpkin; Towns; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 12:32AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Towns, southeastern Lumpkin, White and east central Union Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1231 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Titus to Low Gap Shelter to near Auraria, and moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Cleveland, Hiawassee, Young Harris, Helen, Unicoi State Park, Robertstown, Blue Mountain Shelter, Mossy Creek, Titus, Low Gap Shelter, Anna Ruby Falls, Leaf, Plum Orchard Gap Shelter, Turners Corner, Sautee, Qualatchee Lake, Whitley Gap Shelter, Brasstown Bald and Mountain Scene. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
